CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 16, 1950, pg. 2, reads: "Pitt Summer Commencement - Numerous Negro students were among the persons graduating or receiving degrees at eh University of Pittsburgh's summer commencement held in Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Hall last Friday evening. Among them were...Bottom center: Howard Thomas and WIlla P. Rose received Bachelor of Science degrees in education.  Louis Mason, pictured with them, received a Master of Arts degree in industry and economics... - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of University of Pittsburgh graduates Howard Thomas, Willa P. Rose, and Louis Mason, posed in hallway of Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Hall
